messages.subject: Re: Welcome to AlwaysLearning
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, all. My name is Roxana, and I m Pam s fourteen year old daughter. :) I just joined this list because I was reading it over my mother s shoulder, and it
messages.messageBody:
Hello, all. My name is Roxana, and I'm Pam's fourteen year old daughter. :)

I just joined this list because I was reading it over my mother's shoulder,
and it seemed very interesting.

So - there's my reason, here I am, and hello again. :)

--Roxana
